# inputSourceID

**Instance Property**

An identifier for an input source.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputSourceID: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier is unique among the input sources exposed by particular capture device instance.

## Accessing properties

- **localizedName**: A localized, human-readable name for the input source.

items.description: A localized, human-readable name for the input source.
items.name: localizedName
